actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Department of Education Organization Act to establish an Office of Nongovernmental Education.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Amends the Department of Education Organization Act to establish an Office of Nongovernmental Education, to be administered by the Assistant Secretary for Nongovernmental Education. Directs the Assistant Secretary to prepare and transmit an annual report to the Secretary of Education on specified matters. Terminates the Office of Non-Public Education.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Department of Education Organization Act to establish an Office of Nongovernmental Education.
